com.ociweb.box
Class BOXSAXDecoderImpl

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.ociweb.box.BOXDecoder
        |
        +--com.ociweb.box.BOXSAXDecoderImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
BOXConstants, BOXSAXDecoder
public class BOXSAXDecoderImpl
extends com.ociweb.box.BOXDecoder
implements BOXConstants, BOXSAXDecoder

Decodes Binary Optimized XML (BOX) into SAX events. This is more compact and can be parsed faster than standard XML.

Author:
R. Mark Volkmann, Object Computing, Inc.

Generates SAX events from BOX.
Specified by:
decode in interface BOXSAXDecoder
Parameters:
is - the input stream from which to read the BOX
contentHandler - the ContentHandler to receive SAX events
lexicalHandler - the LexicalHandler to receive SAX events; can pass null if not using; currently only comment events are generated

decode

public org.w3c.dom.Document decode(java.io.InputStream is)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   org.xml.sax.SAXException
Generates SAX events from BOX and uses them to create a Document. This is primarily for testing the other decode method. DOMSAXDecoder can be used instead to create a Document from BOX.
Specified by:
decode in interface BOXSAXDecoder
Parameters:
is - the input stream from which to read the BOX
Returns:
a Document populated from it
